specials.name: Ranged
specials.description: bone prison +17 (+12/+7) (magical, thrown 30 feet), Effect see Bone Prison

specials.name: Golem Antimagic
specials.description: harmed by positive (6d6, 2d6 from areas or persistent damage); healed by negative (2d6 HP); slowed by earth

specials.name: Vulnerable to Raise Dead
specials.description: A raise dead spell negates the golem's golem antimagic and its resistance to physical damage for 1 round.

specials.name: Bone Prison
specials.description:
A creature hit by a bone prison takes 2d10 bludgeoning damage and must make a DC 24 Reflex saving throw or be captured by the bone prison. If the bone golem uses this attack again, any previous bone prisons collapse into a pile of bones and any captured creature is freed. A bone prison is an object and has hardness 10 and 24 Hit Points. A captured creature can attempt to Escape (DC 26) or attack the prison against an AC of 20.
Critical Success The creature is unaffected.
Success The creature takes half damage and is grabbed by the bone prison.
Failure The creature takes full damage and is grabbed by the bone prison.
Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is restrained by the bone prison.

specials.name: Aching Bones
specials.description: The bone prison squeezes a captured creature. The target takes 1d10+9 bludgeoning damage (DC 24 basic Fortitude save).

immunity.value: bleed, death effects, disease, doomed, drained, fatigued, healing, magic (see Golem Antimagic below), mental, necromancy, nonlethal attacks, paralyzed, poison, sickened, unconscious
